ygData.subject: The Devil... arrives.(ATTN: Iron Raptor, Prowl, Maximals)
ygData.msgSnippet: Back in the time and reality of the Vile Force and the Infecticons, on the X-PRedacons secret base, a large group of people stand on either side of a ship. Not

Subject: The Devil... arrives.(ATTN: Iron Raptor, Prowl, Maximals)
Message-ID: <9k1q9q+b14l@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 4992
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: Legendarynemasis@...

Back in the time and reality of the Vile Force and the Infecticons, 
on the X-PRedacons secret base, a large group of people stand on 
either side of a ship. Not a ship that is huge, nor is it large, but 
it is not that small either. The ship is simply a small transport 
ship... In front of the craft lies a gateway, wires and other things 
leading to seperate computers against walls which Mindmurderer 
hastily works at making it seem as though there is five of him at 
once. As he finishes typing in a last string of symbols two doors 
open as the X-Predacon robots, Cartman, Kyle, Stan, and an orange bot 
walk out of, the new guy is Kenny. Behind them, the looming form of 
Devil Gigatron appears. He quickly pushes through the smaller robots 
and makes his way to Mindmurderer.

Devil Gigatron: "Is Devil Gigatrons ship ready?"

Mindmurderer: "Yes it is, we even had time to add in the features you 
reques..."

Devil Gigatron raises his hand up, abruptly making the X-Predacon go 
silent.

Devil Gigatron: "Jabroni, did Devil Gigatron as if the features in 
his craft were added in or did he just ask if his damn ship was 
ready?"

The orange bot walks up to Gigatron and reaches up, pulling on Devil 
Gigatrons raised arm. Devil Gigatron looks to his right and then 
glares down at Kenny who begins to speak through like ten or so mouth 
plates. His speech fully muffled by the plates making it hard to hear.

Kenny: "YouaskediftheshipwasreadyDevilGigatron. 
areyougoingtokillhimnow?"

Devil Gigatron continues to glare as he removes Kenny hand from his 
arm. He then turns to face and look down at the bright orange bot.

Devil Gigatron: "You dare.. touch the great one? Tell me... jabroni.. 
did Devil Gigatron give you permission to touch the X-Predacon 
peoples arm?"

Kenny: "...WellnobutyouaskedmindripperaquestionwhichIdecidedtoanswer."

Devil Gigatron paces back and forth in front of the robot as he then 
turns around to Kenny once again. 

Devil Gigatron: "Did.. Devil Gigatron ask you that question Jabroni? 
Did you answer a question the great one asked some other piece of 
monkey crap that wasn't you?"

Kenny remains silent as Devil Gigatron looks enraged but then smirks.

Devil Gigatron: "Now you see, you have left Gigatron with one option. 
You see, Devil Gigatron is going to have to get all rough now before 
he goes back in time to make sure we don't get slagged. My only 
option now is... to lay the smackdown on your candy skidplate!"

Kenny sweatdrops as Devil Gigatron transforms into a giant hand, one 
of the fingers then fires down a batch of flame, thoroughly scorching 
the bot. However that is not the end of the beating, immediately 
after that the giant hand bashes Kenny over the head twice, squashing 
him, it then peels him up off the floor and tosses him into the air 
and smacks him into a wall on his way down where he explodes. Making 
Cartman, Kyle, and Stan stand their with their mouths gaping.

Stan: "Oh my god! He killed Kenny!"

Kyle: "You bastard!"

As Kyle says that Devil Gigatron turns to the group after converting 
to robot mode and eyes Kyle angrily.

Kyle: "Eh heh... oops?"

Devil Gigatron just shakes his hand dismissing the three as he turns 
to Mindmurderer. The three bots leave the room as cartman shouts.

Cartman: "Hey stan, i'll Ro Sham Bo you for his room."

Stan: "God damn it fatass he just died!"

Cartman: "So?"

Back in the room, Devil Gigatron is now inside the small transport 
craft as a visual comm from MindMurderer comes in.

Mindmurderer: "We are sending you back to the same time the VIle 
Force is in over the Maximal compound they detected. Their base is 
located in what was known as Antartica. Recently they have..."

Devil Gigatron: "Just launch the great one back into the past damn it 
before I lay the smackdown on your candy skidplate too!"

Mindmurderer cringes as he thinks of what happened to kenny. He then 
closes the com and presses a few buttons causing some weird black and 
blue portal open. He then presses a red button making the small 
transport craft launch into it where it dissapears.  Afterwards the 
gateway explodes into pieces of flaming metl and wire causing 
Mindmurderer to sweatdrop.

Mindmurderer: "Oh boy..."

Back where the RPG is taking place, over Maximal City, the same black 
and blue portal opens up. The ship then exits the portal which then 
closes abruptly. Inside Devil Gigatron types a few buttons causing 
the bottom of the ship to open up and a large metal object with two 
HUGE speakers lower. A moment later the ground itself shakes as do 
the cities walls as for miles around the following words are played 
to some music.

Speakers: "CAN YOU SMEEEELLLLL, What Devil Gigatron is cooking?"

More music is heard as Devil Gigatron opens a transmission to the 
entire Maximal City.

Devil Gigatron: "This is Devil Gigatron, I request a meeting with you 
Maximals about an alliance to beat the monkey snot out of everyone 
here that threatens the future!"
